title: 2023: The Year Blockchain Becomes a Sustainability Solution

content: Blockchain's role in helping the environment can go far beyond energy footprints and carbon credits.

creator: Fran Velasquez
title: Chelsea Manning: Crypto’s Privacy Problem Depends on Improving Its Technology
dc:creator: Fran Velasquez
content: The whistleblower turned security consultant at blockchain startup Nym discusses why the issue of privacy is rooted in the underlying technology of crypto and why regulation is on the horizon.
contentSnippet: The whistleblower turned security consultant at blockchain startup Nym discusses why the issue of privacy is rooted in the underlying technology of crypto and why regulation is on the horizon.

title: Binance net withdrawals topped $3.6B over the last 7 days: Report

title: Bahamas Regulators Slam New FTX Chief For ‘Key Misstatements’

title: German crypto asset trading platform Bitcoin Group SE buys bank with full license

content: Bankhaus von der Heydt has its own stablecoin and digital asset custody and tokenization services, but it was on the market for a while and almost went to BitMex execs.

creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
title: Ethereum rallies to $1,350, but derivatives metrics remain neutral to bearish
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
content: Pro traders aren’t buying ETH’s recent rally to $1,350 and data shows they expect Ether price to retrace if Fed chair Powell takes a hawkish tone on Wednesday.
contentSnippet: Pro traders aren’t buying ETH’s recent rally to $1,350 and data shows they expect Ether price to retrace if Fed chair Powell takes a hawkish tone on Wednesday.
